dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: Welcome to the mystical forest of Aethoria, young adventurer!

dialogue.speaker: Eira
dialogue.text: I've been searching for you. The ancient prophecy has foretold of your arrival.

dialogue.speaker: Lila
dialogue.text: The prophecy? You mean the one about the chosen hero who will save our world from destruction?

dialogue.speaker: Eira
dialogue.text: Yes, that's the one. But be warned, the journey ahead will be treacherous.
